overview: Go behind the scenes with this hair-raising documentary that gets up close and almost too personal with Michigan death-metal band the Black Dahlia Murder, including the boys' mad misbehavior on tour. Candid interviews with band members and all-access backstage passes reveal Black Dahlia Murder's lighter side, while clips from live performances prove these guys definitely know how to bring the musical devastation.
title: The Black Dahlia Murder: Documentary
